mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1 -- 只检查已通过的预约 AND ( (start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime}) )

SELECT * FROM booking WHERE status = 1 -- 已通过的预约 AND is_deleted = 0 AND is_start_notified = 0 -- 未发送过开始通知 AND start_time BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 20 MINUTE) AND DATE_SUB(start_time, INTERVAL 15 MINUTE) <= NOW() -- 开始前15-20分钟窗口
SELECT * FROM booking WHERE status = 1 -- 已通过的预约 AND is_deleted = 0 AND is_end_notified = 0 -- 未发送过结束通知 AND end_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) AND NOW() -- 结束后0-5分钟窗口
